title: Annakili Lyrics Pattra Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Pattra Annakili paathadhilla Song Lyrics
Movie:Pattra,
Music:Sri Krishna
Singers:Santhosh & Malavika

Annakili paathadhilla
avaarampoo paathadilla
kannae un kanna paathaa
thaevayilla cinmea
un kannakuli azhagula
naan odureny padamaa

Deivamagal paarthadilla
thaevarmagan paarthadhilla
kannaa un kanna paarthu
kalangurene varundhi
nee kalyanam pannikitta
pogamaaten velagi.

Annakili paathadhilla
avaarampoo paathadilla
kanna un kanna paathaa
thaevayilla cinmea
un kannakuli azhagula
naan odureny padamaa

sandakozhi paarthadhilla
saadhimalli paarthadhill
adiye unna paarthu
adureney nadanam
un kaalu solusula
en kaalamellam saranam

Paayumpuli paarthadhilla
pazhum pazhamum paarthadhilla
paavi naan unna paarthu
pozhiyiene mazhayaa
nee urusanam paakkum munne
ottikanum murayaa

Nee sirichaa thala padame
kai ananjaa
color varaipadame

nee asanjaa color padame
kai ananjaa
naan eduppen un idupula
oru kadhal padam.

Annakili paathadhilla
avaarampoo paathadilla
kannae un kanna paathaa
thaevayilla cinmea
un kannakuli azhagula
naan odureny padamaa

Velakaaran paarthadhilla
vettaikaran paarthadhill
aaruge unna paarthu
asayireney kodiyaa
nee alumbu pannaama
allikolla rediyaa

Aanpaavam paarthadhilla
annaamalai paarthadhilla
maaney un manasa paarthu
thaeyireney nelavaa
nee azhaga enna vettum
iyanaaru aruvaa

Nee kuninjaa kuru nadanam
thozh nimindhaa
adhil adi padamaa

nee thuninjaa tamil padamaa
naan rasippen
naan rasippen
en usurula ...

Annakili paathadhilla
avaarampoo paathadilla
kanna un kanna paathaa
thaevayilla cinmea
un kannakuli azhagula
naan odureny padamaa
